message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this product has great value, but I need to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I understand your desire to be budget-conscious, but my initial offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to negotiate, but $750,000 is significantly below what I can accept. How about we meet in the middle at $875,000?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to consider $825,000? I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
